III.ii.2.E.5.c
.
Address Codes for Air Force X-Ray Records
To request Air Force x-ray records, use address code
75 for entrance and separation x-rays
.
Note
:  In-service interim x-rays , if available, are accessed via JLV.
title: M21-1, Part III, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section E - Service Record Address Codes and Addresses for Military Records Centers and Other Agencies
citation: Part III, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section E
